home.content:
# Welcome, WDI! --- Here are your main class resources. Etc. #### [Class Notes](https://mottaquikarim.github.io/nycda_day_10/index.html) Our lesson plan for the day. #### [Canvas](https://canvas.instructure.com/courses/1105667) Our class learning management system. #### [CLASSROOM SLACK](https://wdi13.slack.com/messages/general/) Main slack box for your **current** NYCDA WDI cohort. Use this to keep up to date with class news and announcements. #### [NYCDA Slack](https://nycda.slack.com/messages/newyorkcity/details/) NYCDA community slack. Folks who are not in your classroom team (ie: Baba and Taq) will get in touch with you through here. #### [Part-Time WDI Slack](https://nycda.slack.com/messages/pt-web-dev-intensive/details/) Get in touch with other folks who are taking this same course at NYCDA. #### [Gitbot](http://gitbot.co) For submitting homework / deploying your work to the internets #### [Live class notes](http://autosync.io/#/course/Taq/0) Code that we write in class will be synced live to [Autosync](http://autosync.io/#/course/Taq/0). #### [Samantha](http://samantha.fewd.us) In browser live code editor and broadcaster. #### Stuff I've Written **[10 Lessons Learned from 100 Weeks of Teaching FEWD](https://medium.com/@the_taqquikarim/10-lessons-learned-from-100-weeks-of-teaching-fewd-12c43db14f6b#.oeebb5vmd)**, [my full Medium page](https://medium.com/@the_taqquikarim) #### TOOLS Drag any of these above to your Chrome Toolbar to see in action. * #### HTMLValidator Validates your HTML code. Results show up in your console in the Developer Tools * #### HTMLFormatter Formats your HTML code. Results open up in new window. ## JavaScript Practice List Here's a running list of all the javascript practice problems posted in between classes. #### (NEW) [Basic JavaScript Num Ops](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_basic_pset_1) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_basic_pset_1) Super basic number operators and stuff, gets hard towards the end. #### [JavaScript Functions Practice](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Functions_Practice) Feel free to complete **P2.js** to **P8.js** on this page. If you're feeling gutsy, try **P9** and **P10**, however they will require some research! #### [JavaScript Functions Practice 2](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_JavaScript_Basics_PSET) Five more problems for you to work on. #### (NEW) [Declarations vs Expressions PSET](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_func_declarations_vs_expressions) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_func_declarations_vs_expressions) Simple declaration vs expression practice problems. #### (NEW) [Scopes PSET](http://samantha.fewd.us/#/fork/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_func_scope) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#/broadcast/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_func_scope) A list of scope scenarios to think through. #### (NEW) [Default Params PSET](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_func_default_params) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/NYCDA_func_default_params) A list of default params problems. #### [Problems 1-8: The Basics](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_1) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_1) **PURPOSE**: basic review, finger warmers.

#### [Problems 9-16: The Basics](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_2) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_2) **PURPOSE**: more challenging, use of conditionals and random number generators.

#### [Problems 17-24: Conditionals](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_3) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_3) **PURPOSE**: Conditional based problems, ups the level once more

#### [Problem 25: Calculate Grade](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/Calculate_Grade) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/Calculate_Grade) **PURPOSE**: DOM based conditional problem

#### [Problems 26-30: Random](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_4) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_4) **PURPOSE**: DOM based conditional problem

#### [Problems 31-34: Slideshow](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_6) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_6) **PURPOSE**: DOM based slideshow problem

#### [Problems 35-46: Loops](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_8) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_functions_pset_8) **PURPOSE**: Loops practice #### [Problems 47-50: Objects](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_9) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_9) #### [Problems 51-60: Objects II](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_10) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD_629_functions_pset_10)

#### [DOM problem 1](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_1) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_1)

#### [DOM problem 2](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_2) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_2)

#### [DOM problem 3](http://samantha.fewd.us/#fork/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_3) | [LIVE](http://samantha.fewd.us/#broadcast/mottaquikarim/FEWD629_PSET_functions_DOM_3)
